servinfo.title: Cruise control at vehicle speed stored in memory cannot be resumed after cruise control was cancelled by means other than MAIN (ON/OFF) switch

item.ptxt: Before performing this Cruise Control System Symptom Diagnosis, perform cruise control system check referring to Cruise Control System Check .
Check each part in the order from the top of the following list.

condition.ptxt: Cruise control at vehicle speed stored in memory cannot be resumed after cruise control was cancelled by means other than MAIN (ON/OFF) switch

action.ptxt: Check RES/ACC switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
